Name: Reducing city government emission of greenhouse gases by 40 percent by 2030.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reducing city government emission of greenhouse gases by 40 percent by 2030
Summary: The proposed legislation requires a forty percent reduction in city government emissions by calendar year 2030, relative to such emissions for the base year for city government emissions.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1. Paragraph (1) of subdivision b of section 24-803 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as added by local law number 22 for the year 2008, is amended to read as follows:
	(1) There shall be, at minimum, a thirty percent reduction in city government emissions by calendar year 2017, and a forty percent reduction in city government emissions by calendar year 2030, relative to such emissions for the base year for city government emissions. 
	ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect immediately.
LS # 4576  SS
8/19/15 11:00AM
